alert.note: Alert for Inland Kenedy; Inland Willacy; Northern Hidalgo; Southern Hidalgo (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 7:29AM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Kenedy, northeastern Hidalgo, northwestern Cameron and western Willacy Counties through 800 AM CDT... At 729 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles north of Lasara to near Edinburg South Texas International Airport Edinburg South Texas International Airport. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Raymondville, Lyford, Hargill, Lasara, San Manuel, Linn, Faysville, Red Gate, Jose Borrego Middle School and Yturria. This includes the following highways... Interstate Highway 69 E between mile markers 41 and 51. US Highway 77 between mile markers 752 and 762. US Highway 281 between mile markers 750 and 764. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Inland Kenedy; Inland Willacy; Northern Hidalgo; Southern Hidalgo
